name: falcon
description: FALCON - Full-stack aviation weather briefing application (frontend + backend).

scripts.clean-install: npm run clean && npm run bootstrap
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules package-lock.json backend/package-lock.json frontend/package-lock.json
scripts.health-ping: npm run verify-setup && npm run backend:health && npm run frontend:health
scripts.backend:health: curl -f http://localhost:3001/health || echo 'Backend health check failed'
scripts.frontend:health: curl -f http://localhost:3000 || echo 'Frontend health check failed'
scripts.bootstrap: npm run backend:install && npm run frontend:install
